slack-mcp-server.description: The most powerful MCP server for Slack Workspaces. This integration supports both Stdio and SSE transports, proxy settings and does not require any permissions or bots being created or approved by Workspace admins.

smartbear-mcp-server.description: Provides access to multiple capabilities across SmartBear's API Hub, Test Hub, and Insight Hub, all through [dedicated tools and resources](https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/mcp-server).

snyk-mcp-server.description: Enhance security posture by embedding [Snyk](https://snyk.io/) vulnerability scanning directly into agentic workflows.

stackhawk-mcp-server.description: Use [StackHawk](https://www.stackhawk.com/) to test for and FIX security problems in your code or vibe coded app.

synthetic-data-mcp-server.description: Generate realistic test data for development and ML

tako-mcp-server.description: Use natural language to search [Tako](https://trytako.com) for real-time financial, sports, weather, and public data with visualization

teradata-mcp-server.description: This MCP Server support tools and prompts for multi task data analytics on a [Teradata](https://teradata.com) platform.

terraform-mcp-server.description: Seamlessly integrate with Terraform ecosystem, enabling advanced automation and interaction capabilities for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) development powered by [Terraform](https://www.hashicorp.com/en/products/terraform)

the-web-mcp.description: Discover, extract, and interact with the web - one interface powering automated access across the public internet.

tomtom-mcp-server.description: The [TomTom](https://www.tomtom.com/) MCP Server simplifies geospatial development by providing seamless access to TomTom's location services, including search, routing, traffic and static maps data.

unstructured-api-mcp-server.description: Set up and interact with your unstructured data processing workflows in [Unstructured Platform](https://unstructured.io)

verodat-mcp-server.description: Interact with Verodat AI Ready Data platform

veyrax-mcp.description: Single tool to control all 100+ API integrations, and UI components

victoriametrics-mcp-server.description: Comprehensive integration with [VictoriaMetrics APIs](https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victoriametrics/url-examples/) and [documentation](https://docs.victoriametrics.com/) for monitoring, observability, and debugging tasks related to your VictoriaMetrics instances.

watsonx-ai-flows-engine-mcp-server.description: Tool platform by IBM to build, test and deploy tools for any data source

waystation-mcp-server.description: Universal MCP server to connect to popular productivity tools such as Notion, Monday, AirTable, and many more

webscraping-ai-mcp-server.description: Interact with **[WebScraping.AI](https://WebScraping.AI)** for web data extraction and scraping

winston-ai-mcp-server.description: AI detector MCP server with industry leading accuracy rates in detecting use of AI in text and images. The [Winston AI](https://gowinston.ai) MCP server also offers a robust plagiarism checker to help maintain integrity.

xero-mcp-server.description: Interact with the accounting data in your business using our official MCP server

yepcode-mcp-server.description: Run code in a secure, scalable sandbox environment with full support for dependencies, secrets, logs, and access to APIs or databases. Powered by [YepCode](https://yepcode.io)

yugabytedb-mcp-server.description: MCP Server to interact with your [YugabyteDB](https://www.yugabyte.com/) database

zenml-mcp-server.description: Interact with your MLOps and LLMOps pipelines through your [ZenML](https://www.zenml.io) MCP server

gotohuman-mcp-server.description: Human-in-the-loop platform - Allow AI agents and automations to send requests for approval to your [gotoHuman](https://www.gotohuman.com) inbox.

plugged-in-mcp-proxy-server.description: A comprehensive proxy that combines multiple MCP servers into a single MCP. It provides discovery and management of tools, prompts, resources, and templates across servers, plus a playground for debugging when building MCP servers.

pure-md-mcp-server.description: Reliably access web content in markdown format with [pure.md](https://pure.md) (bot detection avoidance, proxy rotation, and headless JS rendering built in).
